recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with a creamy egg and cheese sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta, add garlic, and mix with pasta and egg mixture.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with tender chicken.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken breast, fettuccine, heavy cream, garlic, parmesan
recipes.instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken and garlic. Add cream and cheese. Mix with pasta.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: Rich and creamy beef stew with mushrooms.
recipes.ingredients: Beef sirloin, mushrooms, onions, sour cream, beef broth
recipes.instructions: Sauté beef and onions. Add mushrooms and broth. Stir in sour cream before serving.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, soy sauce, garlic
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and soy sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken, then cook with spices and tomatoes. Add cream before serving.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Flavorful beef tacos with fresh toppings.
recipes.ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, cheese
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve in tortillas with toppings.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
recipes.description: Shrimp cooked in a zesty lemon garlic sauce.
recipes.instructions: Sauté shrimp with garlic and lemon juice. Add butter before serving.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh salad with feta and olives.
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, cucumbers, feta, olives, red onions
recipes.instructions: Mix vegetables with feta and olives. Dress with olive oil and herbs.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil
recipes.instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and basil. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
recipes.description: Smooth and creamy soup with butternut squash.
recipes.ingredients: Butternut squash, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream
recipes.instructions: Cook squash and onions. Blend with broth and cream until smooth.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Tender beef wrapped in puff pastry.
recipes.ingredients: Beef tenderloin, puff pastry, mushrooms, prosciutto
recipes.instructions: Sear beef, then wrap in mushrooms, prosciutto, and pastry. Bake until golden.

recipes.title: Quiche Lorraine
recipes.description: Savory quiche with bacon and cheese.
recipes.ingredients: Pie crust, eggs, cream, bacon, cheese
recipes.instructions: Mix eggs and cream. Add bacon and cheese. Pour into crust and bake.
